Text:
>why would you want a chronological version of this movie?

It's another way of enjoying the movie after seeing the original version.
great quality, quick download. Thanks for the torrent :)
Thanks for great quality... Bwt can you share the subtitles to?

In response to someone asking why they would want this, if you're a fan of the movie already, this is just a fun way to experience it.  Being out of order is obviously part of what makes it so brilliant.  I just hope nobody sees this as their first exposure to the movie.
